summary.span: 提供類別，就章節、段落、圖、項目清單或編號清單以及資料表方面來描述 的結構。

span.span: Provides classes to describe the structure of an in terms of sections, paragraphs, figures, bulleted or numbered lists, and tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式設定和配置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件可讓內容語意形式表示，例如段落、 表格、 的行為模式的不同部分，並列出。The formatting and layout of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document enables different parts of the content to behave in a semantic form such as in paragraphs, tables, and lists. 讓使用者能夠察覺語意結構從它的外觀; 的內容但是，實體格式和配置的標記不會明確地識別實際語意的項目。Humans can perceive the semantic structure of the content from its appearance; but the physical format and layout of the markup does not explicitly identify the actual semantic elements. 若要啟用文件的組織，以程式設計方式了解命名空間提供可以用來定義文件，其語意的組件的結構項目。To enable programmatic understanding of the document organization, the namespace provides structure elements that can be used to define the document by its semantic parts. 每一頁[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件中包含項目，定義其*內容*的執行位置的文字和圖形形式。Each page of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document contains a element that defines its *content* in the form of positional text runs and graphics. 透過使用文件結構項目，頁面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件也會與相關聯定義的項目*結構*章節、 段落、 清單、 圖形的形式中的頁面和資料表。Through the use of document structure elements, pages of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document can also be associated with elements that define the *structure* of the page in the form of sections, paragraphs, lists, figures, and tables. 類別用來定義與文件之標記的內容與結構的組件之間的關聯。The class is used to define the associations between content and structure parts of the document markup. A的子系結構化項目，例如資料表儲存格或項目符號清單項目，它位於網頁階層架構。A is the child of a structural element, such as a table cell or bullet list item that is located in the hierarchy of a page. A中的項目會識別階層相同的頁面。A identifies an item in the hierarchy of the same page. 它是指項目是結構化項目的內容。The item it refers to is the content of the structural element. 建立的應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件不需要包含結構標記，但使用的文件結構項目可增強的應用程式可以存取和使用文件內容的彈性。Applications that create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents are not required to include structural markup, but use of document structure elements enhances the flexibility by which applications can access and use the content of a document. 如需有關的結構項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件，請參閱第 9 章和附錄 E 的 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about structure elements of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents, see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).
